b'This world\xe2\x80\x99s a testing place. Things won\xe2\x80\x99t go according to your plan. What He wills, happens. If heaven was on earth, we won\xe2\x80\x99t be tested!'
b'Almighty. I bring my burden to you because I can\xe2\x80\x99t make it on my own. Give me strength, comfort me, heal my heart & help me carry on.'
b'Almighty. On this blessed day, may we never be the cause of pain for anyone. May we always be a source of light & goodness wherever we go.'
b'Protect your heart at all costs. Don\xe2\x80\x99t let negative, nasty people in. Everything comes from your heart. If you lose it, you lose everything.'
b'For every trial that comes your way, the Almighty has given you strength to face it. He would never give something you couldn\xe2\x80\x99t handle.'
b'The day we enter Paradise is the day we have succeeded. None of the pain would be remembered. Pray that He grants it to us by His Mercy.'
b'The Almighty sees our tears & hears our prayers always. Pray that He strengthens us so we can face the trials with utmost patience.'
b'If someone says or does something that upsets you, don\xe2\x80\x99t take it to heart. It\xe2\x80\x99s not easy but it\xe2\x80\x99s for your own peace of mind. Just forgive.'
b'The Almighty knows what He\xe2\x80\x99s doing. Don\xe2\x80\x99t ever doubt that. He has your best interest at heart. It\xe2\x80\x99s part of His plan. Trust Him fully.'
b'Hold on tight to your prayers. Don\xe2\x80\x99t let go because they repel the evils of this world. When done properly, they\xe2\x80\x99re a source of peace!'
b'You go through pain for a reason; from feeling lost to being found, from despair to faith, from falling to getting up again. It\xe2\x80\x99s His plan.'
b'It\xe2\x80\x99s normal for us to feel unappreciated & unrewarded if we\xe2\x80\x99re doing things for the wrong reasons. Do it for His sake & He will reward you!'
b'No matter how much you\xe2\x80\x99ve sinned, don\xe2\x80\x99t let the guilt take you away from remembering the Almighty. Ask Him sincerely for forgiveness.'
b'Shift your focus from doing the impossible to make life perfect.  Concentrate on what\xe2\x80\x99s within you; be content on the inside; be positive.'
b'Let\xe2\x80\x99s face it, we will never be able to write down every single blessing the Almighty has given us. Start being grateful. Thank Him daily.'
b'Don\xe2\x80\x99t fret if the world still doesn\xe2\x80\x99t know you despite the good you\xe2\x80\x99ve done! The Almighty knows & the angels are mentioning you in Paradise'
b'On this blessed day, Almighty, protect us from tragedy & evil of this world. Grant us strength & patience to face whatever You send our way'
b'When your heart\xe2\x80\x99s not in the right place & you feel uncomfortable about something, it\xe2\x80\x99s often wise not to pursue it & to leave it alone.'
b'RT @SulaimanMoola: By Allah,I am speechless.\nIt is pouring  here,Rohingyans are taking shelter under trucks.\nMum takes her kids on a tree t\xe2\x80\xa6'
b"When things around you don't seem to make sense, perhaps the best thing to do is to say nothing.. just pray. The Almighty's in full control"
b'One of the problems with social media is that topics once discussed in private are now debated with no holes barred in front of young minds'
b"When something bad has passed, learn to thank Him & move on. Don't keep replaying it in your mind. Start healing & move on."
b'Learn from past experience & mistakes.The Almighty sent them for a reason. If the same situation happens again, draw on the lessons learnt.'
b"In life, there'll always be those who want to drag you down. Don't let them. Keep your head up. Focus. The Almighty is All-Knowing."
b"Learn to be at peace with yourself for not being perfect. Don't hide behind a mask. Empty your heart out & tell Him your fears & doubts."
b"When your heart's heavy and your mind's anxious, turn to the Almighty's limitless Mercy. No matter what you're facing, He's there for you."
b"The Almighty knows you're tired, fed up, close to breaking point. But He's given strength within you even when you feel weak. Keep going."
b"Bit by bit we're being trained by social media to compare our lives instead of appreciating what we have. Be wary before it destroys us."
b"Worry is part of life. It's natural for us as humans to have such thoughts. What's important is not to let them get the better of us."
b"Don't be too quick to share pictures of your success. Many don't like it & are likely to become jealous. Be humble & avoid the limelight."
b"Many are guilty of this. We make ourselves unhappy because we're trapped in our own thoughts. Snap out of it. Have a positive mindset."
b'When we intentionally harm or accuse the innocent, we\'re actually cursing ourselves. It"ll return some day to haunt us in a bad way. Beware.'
b"Don't give up when it's hard. Don't give up when life's not fair. Keep going despite the odds. The Almighty will bring you through it."
b"Just because something happens to shake your faith doesn't mean it should break your faith. The Almighty is watching you. Keep going."
b'Appreciate the little acts of kindness; feel the love & appreciate all things around you. Learn to swallow & ignore things that hurt you.'
b'Your enemy may have wanted to harm you. But know that the Almighty has the last say. He will protect you & make you emerge victorious.'
b'Be strong & have good courage. Nothing is too much for Him. The Almighty has already armed you with strength for every battle!'
b"Endure the tough times. That's when we gain something. We may not like it but we gain experience & endurance. It develops our character."
b'The higher you climb in life, the more people will criticize you. Even at your best, people will still find a bone to pick. Ignore them.'
b'Feel the mountain of worries crumble & your heart at ease when you supplicate to the Almighty. Such is the power of prayer. Trust Him.'
b"Don't let your pain make you unkind. Nobody knows what the other person is going through. There's too much suffering in the world already."
b"You won't understand everything that's going on in life. It's ok. The Almighty has a plan. He knows how to bring good out of it. Keep going"
b'Absolutely amazing time-lapse of the #Tawaf of the #Kaabah  and the night prayer in #Makkah during #Hajj2017. Credi\xe2\x80\xa6 https://t.co/NvIUrr6b0J'
b"Beware the ones who are so overtaken by their own arrogance & ego that they forget to make amends & mend ties with the people they've hurt."
b'Stop overthinking. Stop feeding your mind negative thoughts & self doubt. Love yourself enough & remember He only wants the best for you.'
b"Keep doing the right thing despite the trouble, difficulty & betrayal. One day, the Almighty will connect the dots & it'll all make sense."
b'Challenge yourself each day to fully concentrate on your prayers. Throw worldly distractions out. Focus on Him & give Him what He deserves!'
b"Get rid of your attachment to material things. Give what you don't need to charity. You'll find your life calmer & your mind clearer."
b"Don't try to justify your sin\nby comparing it to the sin of others. It won't make you feel better. What we really need is His forgiveness."
b"One of the biggest tests is if you're able to keep it humble even when you have much. Sacrifice in His cause. He'll give you even more."
b"Whatever you choose to do, don't brag about it. Keep it between you and the Almighty. Any arrogance will make your effort meaningless."
b'You may have forgotten the good deeds you did but the Almighty never forgets. He remembers everything! Whatever good you do is never wasted'
b"Whatever happens will happen. Don't try to control the outcome of everything that happens in life. The Almighty's always in full control."
b'A silent prayer from a pure heart is more meaningful for a cause you support than getting a huge number of likes for it on social media.'
b'Almighty. Grant ease to the #Rohingya & their suffering. Only You can get them out of the oppression. We keep praying for their safety.'
b"Don't compare yourself to the one who has more. It's a dangerous path to take. You'll become bitter. He blesses us differently. Give thanks"
b"Keep repenting. Ask for His forgiveness. Ask Him sincerely not to punish us for past sins, present ones; what we've forgotten or overlooked"
b'Those who show real patience are most dear to the Almighty. Giving up is not in their vocabulary. They struggle & strive for His sake.'
b"The problem with us is we're impatient. We always demand answers, wanting things to make sense now. The Almighty is All-Knowing. Trust Him."
b"Do you feel overwhelmed by the pressures & uncertainties in life? Don't let such things drag you down because the Almighty is in control!"
b"Don't get upset when those you thought would stay but didn't. The Almighty knows who belongs in your life. You've got to trust His plans!"
b"When someone utters rude & unkind words, don't retaliate. Ask the Almighty to grant you strength to respond in the best possible way."
b'No matter how sad, depressed, confused or broken you are, always praise the Almighty. He will reward you in ways you could never imagine!'
b"Before we complain, let us not forget that we're better off than many in this world. Our struggles are small compared to theirs. Thank Him!"
b'Be wary of this trap. You try hard to please everyone else that you jeopardize your link with the Almighty. Protect yourself at all costs!'
b'Wishing you a Blessed Eid-ul Adha. Eid of the sacrifice of Prophet Abraham pbuh. #EidMubarak #SelamatHariRayaHaji'
b'Eidul Adhaa Lecture by Mufti Menk from Harare Zimbabwe \n\nhttps://t.co/GFKvnlpYdy'
b'Almighty. Protect those on Hajj & keep them safe. Accept their acts of worship & prayers. Grant us this journey at least once in our lives.'
b'Almighty. On this #DayofArafah, make it a day of renewal of faith in our hearts. May we repent sincerely & draw ourselves closer to You.'
b'Do as much good as possible today, #DayofArafah. We have no idea which deed will please Him so much that He will forgive & grant us Mercy.'
b'Millions of pilgrims are spending the night in this tent city of #Mina. May the Almighty accept their sacrifice and\xe2\x80\xa6 https://t.co/27Ozq7S46T'
b"No matter what you're facing, don't let doubt & fear overtake you. Stay focused. Don't forget His Promise that nothing lasts in this life!"
b'May the Almighty safeguard those embarking on the #Hajj shortly, make it easy for them and accept their pilgrimage. Aameen #Hajj2017'
b"If you're tempted to judge others, remember, you haven't walked their path. You don't know their story. Think good thoughts of them instead"
b"No matter how prepared you are, death will come unannounced. Live each day doing good, before you're trapped with your deeds in the grave."
b'No matter how painful your experience was, never treat people the way they treated you. Let them be or just walk away. Choose to be better.'
b'The rich, suffocating in wealth yet the poor may be at peace. A friend could stab you in the back & your enemy saves you! Such is this life'
b'A believer never takes delight in the fault of others. Remember, you could make the same mistake tomorrow. Find it in your heart to be kind'
b'What you think of in difficult times says a lot about you. It can make a difference if you choose an attitude of faith instead of giving up'
b"How strange are humans! We plan our lives the way we think it should go, forgetting He's the Best Planner. It's the trials that let us grow"
b"Just because you're having a bad day doesn't give you the right to be mean to others or worse, to put them down. Be mature, rise above it!"
b'Satan will remind you to focus on the burden & miss the blessing. The Almighty has brought you this far..do you think He will abandon you?'
b"Be wary of your tongue. The harsh words you utter may scar others for life. You can heal broken bones but it's harder to heal a broken mind"
b'Almighty. Help us make the most of these special days. Help us draw nearer to You; grant us Your Mercy & save us from the flames of hell.'
b"When you don't get what you want and you find it hard to trust Him; that's when you need to bear utmost patience. He'll reward you greatly!"
b"It's better to be labeled antisocial than to be in company that will drag you down. Be wary of those who'll deviate you & lead you astray."
b"Be careful of Satan.  He'll make you think you're more pious than others.He'll make you harsh, unforgiving & judgmental towards people."
b"Are you clinging on to something that's killing your faith & drawing you away from the Almighty? It's never too late to get back on track."
b'Beware the person with a sweet tongue but a bitter heart. He will use the best words you want to hear but his intent is far from good.'
b'The problem with us is we complain about our sorrow & grief to people & not to our Creator. Confide in Him & see what a difference it makes'
b'As we enter this blessed month, we ask the Almighty to accept all our deeds, make them heavy on our scales and may He grant us Paradise!'
b"Society will make you believe that you need more, you're not good enough. Remember, this life is not perfect. Thank Him for everything."
b"Be wary of haters on social media. They say things to get a reaction from you. They'll never see your side of things. Don't waste your time!"
b"Pray for others as you do for yourself. Don't forget to pray for those you don't like as well. They need Him as much as you do, if not more"
b"It's important not to get caught up in what you can't control. Take life day by day. Focus on the positive. Tomorrow's not guaranteed."
b"Nothing lasts; especially people. They come & go. Don't get your hopes high. Don't build your lives around others. This is part of His Plan"
b"Don't miss out on the blessings He has bestowed on you because you're never satisfied & keep wanting more. Focus on what you already have."
b"If people choose to be rude, just smile & hold your ground. Don't retaliate. It reflects  badly on them, not you. Keep your peace."
b'Those who take away innocent lives in the Name of the Giver of Life, cannot claim to belong to any religion.'
b"Don't lose the link with your Maker. Focus on your daily prayers. Fix them. Perfect them. Put your full trust in Him. He won't let you down"
b"Life won't come to a standstill just because you have an issue with someone. Don't let it affect your heart. Be tolerant. Live & let live."
b"At times, you know you're right. In fact it may even be quite obvious that you are, but for the sake of peace, you just learn to let it go!"
b'May the Almighty protect us from evil doers who go out of their way to cause harm & hurt. May He grant peace & security in troubling times.'
b"Be content with what you have & you'll be happy. Be patient with the little; grateful for the big. Accept His Decisions. They're the best!"
b"Don't rely on others to make you happy. Be positive. The Almighty is by your side. Take care of your mind set. He will make you confident."
b"When times are tough, that's when your character is developed. When you face trials & suffering, your soul is strengthened. So keep going."
b"When your failure brings you closer to your Creator, that's NOT failure. That is your success. Thank the Almighty for it."
b"It's the ending that's important. Not the flaws in the beginning. Strive to improve what's left of your life. He'll forgive what has passed"
b'Beware those who are always unhappy & will go out of their way to make others feel bad. These negative people will use you & tire you out!'
b"Don't stay down when you're knocked down. Get back up again. The Almighty didn't bring you this far to leave you there all by yourself!"
b'Pray for a heart of ease, calm & hope. Pray that the Almighty protects it from being cold & bitter. Pray that He keeps it firm in faith.'
b"Don't look down on others with arrogance. Try to help as much as you can. Be tolerant with people. The Almighty will open doors for you."
b"We're in a sad state. We let society dictate the norms.We're victims of our own desires, happy to please the world. What about our Creator?"
b"No matter what happens in life, keep a good heart. A heart of patience & trust. Don't let the darkness of this world harden your heart."
b"You think things look like they're getting worse. But they're actually getting better. The Almighty's checking on you & will pave the way!"
b'Be wary of Satan. He wants us to be ashamed of our faith. He wants people to ridicule us. Hang on tight. Pray for our hearts to stay firm.'
b'Almighty, our sins are countless but Your Mercy is limitless. Forgive us. Do not shame us on the Day that matters most. We need Your Shade!'
b"There's a reason why He sent others away & left you alone. Tell Him your regrets, worries, fears & hopes. He's listening & ready to respond"
b"Most of us get defensive when we're criticized. Don't. Listen instead. Take in the message. Assess the situation & what you need to do!"
b'It is sad that the only way some will talk about you is when they hear of bad news about you. Let them spread what they will. He knows!'
b'We work so hard to make everyone else happy with us, yet, some people will still find it not good enough. Please the Almighty instead.'
b"Your heart may have been stabbed by hurtful words from careless people. You're in pain. Comfort & soothe yourself with the Almighty's words"
b'The problem is we notice mistakes in others so quickly that we overlook the good in them. Forgive others if we expect Him to forgive us!'
b"Learn from your past but leave it there. Don't keep going back. It will destroy your future. Live for what the Almighty has given you today"
b"While you're busy giving others advice, remember at times you need to listen to & follow your own advice as well. This is the way to grow!"
b"At times, our greatest enemy is the frustration we feel with the Almighty's timing. We forget He creates obstacles to test our patience."
b"Don't be too focused on somebody else's life on social media that you try to be like them. You'll be jealous & bitter. Live your own life!"
b'When you feel completely broken, the only thing that can heal you is connecting with the Almighty in prayer. Only He has the power to heal.'
b'Never wish pain on others. They may have caused you pain but pray for them instead & wish them healing. The truth is they need that most!'
b"Don't feel trapped by the situation you're in. Pain, loneliness, financial woes; turn to the Almighty. He has promised a way out. Trust Him"
b'The trouble with us is we are so desperate to be understood, we get upset when people misunderstand us but we forget to be understanding!'
b'No matter how wrong it was or who wasn\xe2\x80\x99t there for you, don\xe2\x80\x99t use it as an excuse to blame others. Be responsible for your own actions.'
b"Don't hold grudges. Let them go & be merciful. Remember, the mercy you show others is the mercy the Almighty is going to show you."
b'Almighty, we ask You to renew our hearts with strength & purpose. Forgive our past sins & help us get closer to You. Guide us always!'
b"Don't think marriage is what you see in pictures on Instagram. It's hard work, a lot of sacrifice as well as give & take.Prepare to commit!"
b"Don't be sad when people plot & plan against you. The Almighty is in full control. Remember, His Will is above everyone's else's."
b"When you ask the Almighty, you don't need to apologise for repeating yourself. He knows your situation & loves those who are persistent!"
b"Whatever problem you may have with others, being abusive & violent is not the solution. It doesn't solve anything. It only makes it worse."
b'Nothing lasts. Your sadness will pass, your youth will leave you. Your pain will vanish. So keep moving to reach our final destination!'
b"How many of us miss out on today because we're worried about tomorrow? Today's a gift from the Almighty. You can never get it back!"
b"Avoid people who bring you misery, disturb your peace & don't allow you to be yourself. Choose those who support, motivate & encourage you."
b"Sort matters out soonest when you've had a dispute with someone. You can't possibly have a restful sleep, knowing you've wronged someone."
b"You may have a head full of knowledge but if you've no compassion & not willing to lend a helping hand, you need to relook your values!"
b'We worry about what will happen tomorrow, next month, next year.. it never ends. Focus on now, the present. Work to get closer to Him!'
b'Blessed is the one whose heart is so broken but still has the courage to be gentle & kind to others. Cherish such people. Learn from them.'
b"It's easy to be good to the one who's good to you. The real test is when you can be good to someone who\xe2\x80\x99s done you wrong. That's maturity!"
b"Don't let people drag you into their drama & petty quarrels. Excuse yourself & refuse to take part in it. Life is less stressful that way."
b'We often carry our broken hearts to people, reveal to them our problems, only to be hurt even more. Confide in the One who heals the hearts.'
b"The longer you hold on to your anger, the more damage & harm it can do. Let go of such ill feelings & don't let them fester in your heart."
b'Almighty, on this blessed day, grant ease to the oppressed living with injustice, fear & terror. Stop the calamities & restore peace.'
b"You'll feel empty for as long as you fill your heart with love of this world. Cultivate love for the Hereafter; it'll fill your heart!"
b"The trouble with us is we let our hearts harden after we've been wronged. Keep your heart pure & soft, no matter what. He'll reward you!"
b"Whatever you're going through, nobody will understand your true situation until it actually happens to them. So confide in the All-Knowing."
b"The truth is some may dislike you for no reason whatsoever. These are tests you have to endure. Don't retaliate. The Almighty's in control."
b'We worry so much about being accepted by people. We always want to fit in. Forget about what the world says. Gain His acceptance instead!'
b"There's no life without trials & no success without patience. So the harder your test, the more hopeful you should be that His help is near"
b"Don't despise or hurt others. You may seem powerful today but things can change in the blink of an eye. Reflect & stay humble. Thank Him."
b"Keep your heart pure. Let others do what they will. Keep doing good. Don't dim your light to become as dark as they are. Shine above them!"
b'Love those who want good for you & sincerely correct you. Not he who wants to show up your fault. A believer is the mirror of his brother.'
b"Let go of stress & worry. Hand it to the Almighty. There's no need for anxiety & panic attack. Supplicate. Ask Him. He'll get you out of it"
b"With social media, some live a life that's not theirs. Things look perfect on the outside. Don't live to please others.Get back to reality!"
b"When you feel let down by those closest to you, don't despair. The Almighty won't let you down. Get even closer to him in your low moments."
b"If you can't help others, don't hurt them. In the end, what counts is our character & the impact we had on others. Live a life that matters"
b"If you're not happy with life, reflect & commit to change. If you're not worshipping Him as you should, don't wonder why peace escapes you!"
b"Some people will always choose to misunderstand your intent & look for flaws. No matter what you do, you can't change them. Pray for them!"
b"On this blessed Friday, Almighty, save us from diseases of the heart. Hypocrisy. Envy. Pride. Anger. Jealousy. Don't let our hearts harden."
b"We point a finger & correct others often but why is it so hard to correct ourselves? No one's perfect. Admit your faults & correct them."
b"If you're always filled with worry, stress & anxiety, you need to relook your life. You're supposed to trust the Almighty & His plans."
b"Whatever you're facing now, only the Almighty will understand it. Don't bother explaining to someone else. Be patient. It'll be worth it!"
b'No matter what life throws at you, remain kind & compassionate. Never be angry & rude. It can be difficult but it will endear you to Him.'
b'Be wary of arrogance. It makes you blind to your weakness. You feel you deserve everything ; never contented. It can lead to your downfall.'
b"Cultivate patience. Being upset won't make you achieve your goals any quicker! Everything has its right time. Every delay has its blessing."
b"When you feel you can't get out of bed to face another day, ask the Almighty to lift you up. His Strength is all you need. Just ask Him!"
b"You don't need to share every aspect of your life with others. Nobody will understand your path anyway. Let them see the finished product."
b"Don't expose your soul to rubbish & expect to have a smooth life. Music. Porn. Foul language. Be careful what you feed your inner self."
b"The most fortunate person isn't he who has worldly wealth but he who is quick to repent, seeks forgiveness & feels regret for all his sins."
b"People will blame you & say nasty things because you refused to be part of their conflict. Let it be. Don't let them disrupt your peace."
b"Good or bad, what you give, you'll get it back. Just leave it to the Almighty to deal with such things. He is All Knowing. He is fair."
b'Value your friends who bring you closer to the Almighty. Learn to let go of relationships that create a distance between you and Him.'
b'Speak the truth & mean what you say. Your word is your honour. Too many people make empty promises which they never intend to fulfil!'
b"Despite the obstacles you face daily, know that you're never alone. You may feel that you are but the Almighty is always watching over you!"
b'Learn to ignore & disregard the noise around you. Keep your heart at peace. Build self control & discipline if you want to get close to Him'
b"Don't be selfish & think only about yourself.  Be sensitive to the needs of others. If you want them to respect your time, respect theirs!"
b'Almighty. On this blessed Friday, we ask You to hide our faults, forgive our sins & not to embarrass us in this world & the  Hereafter.'
b'Make a promise to the Almighty you want to do better than what you did yesterday. He will forgive you for that which has already passed.'
b"Don't try to please everyone. That's a definite recipe for disaster. Be true to yourself instead. The sincere ones will appreciate you."
b'Never rush your acts of worship, knowing it could be your last opportunity to do so. Always put Him above all else. May He have Mercy on us'
b"No matter what you're facing, know that someone else has it worse. Be patient with the problems you have & grateful for what you don't have"
b"Whatever trials you're facing in life, never give up on patience & prayer. They're two of the best antidotes. Be steadfast. He's watching!"
b"The Almighty has blessed us with more than we've asked for. Why choose to despair over the few things you may not have been granted yet?"
b'I am saddened by the death of one of the greatest scholars of Hadith, Shaykh Yunus Jaunpuri RA today. May Allah Almighty grant him Paradise.'
b"Never underestimate any act of kindness, no matter how small it is. It's better to be the one who smiled than the one who didn't smile back"
b'We may have reasons to disagree but that in itself is no reason to hate. Our resentment is more a reflection of ourselves than others.'
b"Don't sleep each night thinking that tomorrow's promised. Nothing's promised in this life except death. Stop for a moment. Think about this"
b"Not everyone will value you. But there are a few who will stand by you no matter what. They're the ones praying for you without you knowing"
b"No matter how bad you're treated, let it go. Wake up ready to take on a new day, as each day is a test. Don't let your anger get in the way"
b'Share whatever you have with someone who has less than you. Use His Blessings & try to cut back on some luxuries. He will grant you more!'
b"You're messing up so much. Satan whispers you should give up because you're not worthy.Don't give in. Call out to the Almighty by His Mercy"
b'Take your problems to the Almighty not to others. Your worry, fear, anxiety, weaknesses; pour out to Him in humility. Wait for the results.'
b"On this blessed day, let us not waste Your  precious gifts of health & time. May we spread goodness now, while we're still able to."
b"Don't waste time trying to prove your critics wrong. They'll never be satisfied & will always find something to pick on. Run your own race."
b"If you want to repent, do it now. If you want to change, start now. Don't wait for the perfect moment.Don't waste the time He has given us!"
b"Some will go out of their way to disturb your peace. Don't allow their petty drama to stress you out. Don't take it to heart. Let it go."
b"Don't expect people to treat you as you treat them. The ones you love the most may be the ones who'll hurt you most. You can't control it!"
b"You think you're coming to a dead end & things will never change. You don't see a way. Trust the Almighty. He has a way out for you."
b"Pay attention to those with special needs, both children & adults. Be more compassionate & patient. They'll inspire you in special ways."
b'Learn to stay away from arguments. They sap your energy & rob you of your inner peace. It takes a mature person to not get into an argument'
b'Seek knowledge from the right people. Don\'t be ignorant or arrogant. Nobody knows it all except the Almighty. Learn to say "I don\'t know".'
b"There's always something we want badly in life. Confide in the Almighty. Connect with Him when the world is asleep. Show Him your sincerity"
b"Don't make life difficult for others. It will all come back to you in some way, some day. Create ease so He will do the same for you."
b"Be patient with yourself. Be kind to yourself. We've all been hurt & had mean things done to us. But we pick ourselves up & keep going."
b"In our lives, we fight too many battles that don\xe2\x80\x99t matter. Remember, they are distractions. Don't waste time. It's not worth your while."
b'Beware the ones who are so full of themselves & see everyone else as deviants. Only they are right. Be careful of this sick mentality.'
b"Life has a way of showing you the true colours of others. Don't beat yourself for not finding out earlier. It'll come to light in the end."
b'Almighty. On this blessed Friday, grant us strength to fulfill our duties unto you. Make it a means of our entry to Paradise by Your Mercy.'
b"Worry is the biggest thief. It steals your time, energy & inner peace. Turn your worry into worship. Seek Him. You'll find your strength!"
b'No matter how shattered your heart is, never lose hope. Cry to Him for as long as you need. Only He can turn tears of sadness into pure joy'
b'Do you sometimes feel like everyone is letting you down? The Almighty puts such people in your life to teach you to depend only on Him.'
b"Don't react to others when you're emotional as you're more likely to misinterpret what they say. It takes a calm, sensible mind to do this."
b"If you want something done well, do it yourself. Don't expect others to feel the same way about it. In most cases, you can't rely on people"
b"Whether things work out or not, it's the Almighty's will. Keep going. Whatever the outcome, there's a blessing in it. Keep smiling."
b"Be wary of those who have a whole set of rules for others but follow none of their own rules. They pretend to be what they're not."
b"People will say & do things to upset you. That\xe2\x80\x99s just the way it is. As long as you behave with integrity, you'll be at peace."
b"Being respectful, kind & polite are often mistaken for flirting. It's sad because such qualities are becoming uncommon in a stressed world."
b"Always remember we're better off than many in this world. Our struggles are small, yet we always complain. Thank Him upon all conditions!"
b"Society will judge you by its own standard. Don't bother with it. The care you've shown, the love you've shared; they matter so much more."
b'As you celebrate Eid, do remember the less fortunate. Keep them in your happiness. May the Almighty grant us all peace & love for humanity'
b"Whether you're celebrating #Eid Sunday or Monday, please have an awesome Eid filled with love, kindness, compassion\xe2\x80\xa6 https://t.co/mFuGEoq671"
b"All the good we've done should not come to an end with the end of Ramadan. Hold on to them beyond this month & start a new beginning."
b"You may think it's impossible to get out of your situation. You're wrong. The Almighty can make things happen that we couldn\xe2\x80\x99t make happen."
b'We all have ups and downs; days where we struggle more than others. Know that the Almighty is aware & will never let our efforts be wasted.'
b"Almighty. On this last Friday in Ramadan, may You accept our fast, deeds & worship. Make us among those who'll see the next Ramadan. Aameen"
b"Don't let our enthusiasm dampen as we approach the last days in Ramadan. Let us renew our intent & refresh our goals. Seek His Forgiveness."
b"If you've been blessed with wealth, thank the Almighty. But be sure to keep the wealth in your hand & not in your heart. Give to please Him"
b"Take advantage of the last few nights & His Mercy. Even if you've slacked off, get back up & finish the month beautifully. Make it count!"
b"Don't look back with regret on missed opportunities. He closed those doors for a reason. May He open doors that always lead us back to Him."
b"Don't bring yesterday's failures into today. Learn from them. Move on. The Almighty has better things in store. Put your full trust in HIM."
b"Don't look at material possessions & form your opinion of others. That's shallow. If you're worried about it, the problem lies with YOU!"
b"If your Ramadan hasn't gone well, don't fret. Use these last few days to give your all. It's the end that matters. The rewards are waiting."
b"Don't stress too much over worldly matters. Worrying about the future or regretting the past is a waste of time. Leave it to the Almighty."
b"The more you give, the more you'll get back. Even if it's not money, give your time, words & advice. He will reward you in greater ways!"
b'May the Almighty grant Paradise to victims of the senseless killings in Ramadan. May He comfort the families left behind & ease their grief.'
b"The last days of Ramadan are the most significant. Now is the time to ask Him for all your needs. The Almighty doesn't tire so don't tire!"
b"Some people just love pushing others down. Don't worry about them. They are powerless to stop what the Almighty has planned for you."
b'Be content with what the Almighty has given you. Be grateful for the big, be patient with the little. Ask Him for  blessings at all times.'
b"Rearrange your busy life in these last blessed days. Pray like you've never done before. With humility, with heart, with soul. Focus on Him"
b'Thank the Almighty for giving us the last blessed nights. May He grant us choicest blessings as we humble ourselves in prayer for His sake.'
b"Don't look at your neighbour & lose hope in your situation. Whatever you want will come to you. Be patient. What's meant to be will be!"
b'Be in the company of those who build you up & have good intent for you; not the ones who pretend they care but will gossip & backstab you.'
b"Don't be sad if your Ramadan isn't going according to plan. Don't regret that you haven't done more. Try to make the most of what's left."
b"Work hard for your Hereafter. Keep a balance with worldly life. You don't need to shout about it. Let the lives you touched make the noise."
b'Almighty. Give us strength to face these most blessed nights. We ask You to accept all our prayers, fasting, charity & all our good deeds.'
b'The Almighty does not consider you superior because of your rank or riches. He looks at your heart, level of piety & your closeness to Him.'
b"Ramadan is like a reset button. He knows we're looking to get rid of bad habits & refresh. It's the best time to start on a clean slate."
b"Are you often suspicious & think ill of others even before verifying? It's a bad habit disliked by the Almighty. Stay away from negativity!"
b"Don't fall into a slump in these last nights of the blessed month. You should be giving it your all. We are never promised the next Ramadan"
b"Don't underestimate the evil-eye. It's real. As far as possible, keep your blessings hidden. Be humble. Make the Almighty your focus."
b'Calamity has its blessings. Embrace it. The Almighty knows. He has seen how it can transform a harsh person into one with the kindest heart'
b'As we enter the last third of Ramadan, pace yourself for the most beautiful nights. May the Almighty keep us strong even when we feel weak.'
b"Don't keep overlooking your small sins. It's dangerous to think that they don't add up. Like pebbles, they can soon turn into mountains."
b"Blaming others for your shortcoming doesn't help you move forward. You can either feel sorry for yourself or make a change for the better."
b'Each day brings new challenge. But with each challenge, let us try to be better; more patient, more conscious of our Maker. Ease will come!'
b'Why do we make negative assumptions about others? Let us break the habit this #Ramadan . If ever we have to assume, make it a good one!'
b"Don't waste acts of worship by engaging in gossip, slander & the likes. You'll end up a bankrupt having to pay off those you've wronged."
b"An HD video of last night's lecture in Dubai has been uploaded onto the YouTube Channel of iacaddubai.\n\nhttps://t.co/xUcpzHGRe6"
b"As we approach the halfway mark in Ramadhan, let us pray for those who've left us, those who are unwell & those facing great hardship."
b"The real test of your character is when circumstances don't go the way you want. Will you then remain a kind, caring & good-hearted person?"
b'Protect yourself from needless harm. Stay lowkey & private when everyone else is overexposed. Pray to Him sincerely to guard your heart.'
b"We walk around as if all is well because we're afraid others will judge if we show our pain. So be kind to others. Everyone has a story!"
b"Angels gather around good company. Make sure to spend your limited time here with good people. Life's too short to live otherwise!"
b"If you're not fasting because your friends are not fasting, you're in the wrong company. Surround yourself with those who make you better."
b"Think of all the useless activities we've engaged in this Ramadan, wasting His precious gift of time. Don't let the month slip by. Seek Him"
b'Be careful of misquoting others, especially with the intention of hurting  them. Not only is it a huge sin, it will come back to haunt you!'
b"You feel nothing is going right. You see delays & closed doors, If you fully trust what He has in store for you, you'll pick yourself up!"
b"Give up jealousy once & for all. One day you're ahead; people are envious of you The next day you're down, no one bothers to look at you."
b'Each day in Ramadan, call out to Him to forgive & guide you. Make it sincere & heartfelt. Ask Him to NOT let you get back to your old ways!'
b'In this blessed month, be wary of what goes out of your mouth. Stay away from lies, backbiting, speaking bad & harsh words. Be disciplined!'
b"It's so common nowadays to boast & announce your achievements. Learn to be humble & dignified when you've done well.Let your actions speak!"
b"No matter what hate & abuse people hurl at you, be kind. Don't go down to their level. Let the Almighty deal with them. He's All-Knowing."
b"When you fast, you're showing the highest form of patience. You readily accept His Decree. You stay away from things that are forbidden."
b"Protect your heart. Give up mindless chatter on social media & among friends. Spend time in good company. This life's short. Don't waste it"
b'Almighty. Bestow peace & sanity across the globe at a time of confusion, bloodshed & loss of lives. Let us treat everyone with respect.'
b'Never look at hardship that comes your way as something permanent. Remember, the Almighty can overturn anything. Besides, nothing lasts!'
b'Every blessing He has bestowed comes & goes for a reason. If you thank Him & trust Him, your heart will always be at peace, no matter what!'
b'In this blessed month, we pray for a heart filled with compassion. May we respond generously & wholeheartedly to those who are in need.'
b'Almighty. On this blessed Friday, give us strength & patience to reach the end of #Ramadan\xc2\xa0in the best way. Make it a turning point for us.'
b"This is the month of change. Don't make it the month of waste.  Each day, countless hearts are softened & turned to Him. Don't miss out!"
b'The Almighty never expects us to be perfect in this blessed month. But He expects us to keep on trying. And He will reward us for it!'
b'For surprise insta-live videos, insta-stories, photographs and more, follow me on instagram https://t.co/bfUwNgHqSP'
b"Don't compare yourself with anyone. You may be struggling to get through the fast while some find it a breeze. He loves your sincere effort"
b"Even if it's ONE bad habit, give it up this Ramadan. Do it for the sake of the Almighty. Let this month impact you like never before."
b"Don't worry about losing an argument, more so in Ramadan. You'll have a home in Paradise if you control yourself, even when you're right!"
b"Don't make it such that we only become good in Ramadan. Remain good & steadfast throughout the blessed month & beyond. Quit the old habits!"
b"Don't feel you're doing more than others in Ramadan. They may be doing it privately while you're only pointing fingers & seeking attention."
b'Live each moment of Ramadan to the fullest. Our lives are short. This blessed month is even shorter. Connect with the Almighty in all ways!'
b"Staying away from food isn't just what Ramadan's all about. Don't forget to control tempers & tongues, even more important now than ever!"
b'#Ramadan is a month of forgiveness. If you let this month go without seeking & being granted His Forgiveness, you have truly missed out.'
b"Having reached #Ramadan is a blessing in itself. Nobody's promised this month. So recognise its value. Pray, give charity, purify the heart"
b"Plan your Ramadhan well. Don't jump into it & expect the spirituality to last the entire month & beyond. Small consistent acts are better!"
b"It's never too late to make this your best #Ramadan. Start planning. Keep your intent pure. It's not about being perfect; just do your best"
b"As we enter #Ramadhan if we're upset with anyone, let us forgive one another for His sake. Let us not keep a heart full of grudges."
b'Almighty. Let us greet the month of great blessing with a pure heart, fasting for only You. Help us control our desires & suppress greed.'
b'Our lives have become so public without us even realising it. One click is all it takes to see the lifestyles of others; even strangers!'
b"If you enjoy His blessing, you must also accept His trials. That's how it is. When you envy the blessings of others, remember their trials."
b'What we say about others speaks a lot about our own character. When we speak ill of people, we hurt them & damage our reputation as well.'
b"Don't bring your yesterday into today. Each new day is a means for us to get closer to the  Almighty. Don't waste it. Not everyone gets it."
b"As long as you're alive, there'll be people who will speak ill of you. That's life. Just stay above it all. Don't do what others do!"
b"Cut out bad talk, swear words & evil speech. Don't hurt people's feelings. Keep doing good & you'll feel a lot better as a person."
b"There's no room for hate & violence in this world. The after effects are more damaging. Spare a thought for humanity. All lives are sacred."
b"If you feel bad after you've sinned, take heart. There's hope. It shows the Almighty wants you to get up & get off on the right foot again."
b"Don't lose sleep over what others have been blessed with. The Almighty's the Owner of Sustenance. Be happy instead. He'll give you more."
b'Nobody knows what tomorrow will bring; will you have enough money, get married or have children? Trust Him completely. Live each day fully.'
b"At times we feel life's unfair because we don't know what the Almighty knows. Don't hurt those who hurt you. Move past it. Let it be."
b"Do something nice for someone today. The first to benefit from this is you. You'll feel a sense of comfort & the great reward is from Him!"
b"Social media can hurt young minds. Eating disorders, depression, addiction, poor self image when you start comparing!They're real! Be safe!"
b"If you don't want to be chained to your past, learn to let go of the grudges you're holding. This life is way too short. Just live!"
b'Amidst all the goings-on, learn to step away from the chaos of life. Reconnect your soul with your Creator. Your heart will find peace!'
b'On this blessed day Almighty, help us purify our hearts from spiritual sins; greed, malice, envy, arrogance & hatred. Draw us close to You.'
b'If you want something, ask the Amighty for it; a good job, a dutiful spouse? Raise your hands sincerely. Nothing is impossible for Him.'
b"Learn to be happy with what you've been blessed with. If you think by getting more you'll be happier, you're fooling yourself. Be grateful."
b"You may not see a way out of your desperate situation but that doesn't mean the Almighty doesn't have a way. He knows the best time!"
b"Learn to fend for yourself. Don't depend on others or wait for their help. You may end up waiting all your life. Ask only from your Creator"
b'Some will wrong you & not bat an eyelid. It may bother you how they can be so heartless. But thank the Almighty. At least you have a heart!'
b"Today, we're bothered about how our lives look to others. We try to paint the best picture. Stop! It's truly about how it feels to us!"
b"Often we look for the good in people, only to be let down because good can be masked by fake clothing. Let's look for what's real instead."
b'We are quick to give up on others because of their shortcomings. Yet the Almighty is most merciful towards us each time we do wrong.'
b"Bury your ego. Get it out of the way. Learn to be compassionate instead. Live from your heart. You'll end up a much happier person."
b"If a friend walks out on you because of your faith, don't despair. The Almighty will replace him with someone even better. Stay firm."
b"Yes, this life is tough. Our tired souls, exhausted minds & deep scars tend to make us forget what He has promised. Don't quit, press on!"
b"Don't fool ourselves & think we have all the time in the world. We don't. Do good as much as possible. You never know when the time is up!"
b"Humans are strange. When they can't understand you, they label. When you're quiet, you're proud. When shy, you're stuck-up. Let them judge!"
b"Whatever happens, keep moving. The ups & downs, the love & hate, the good & bad. They come & they go. That's our journey. We'll get there!"
b'Many are so careful with their health & wealth, going to great lengths to protect it. But sadly, they neglect the state of their hearts.'
b'Almighty. On this blessed day, we ask You to grant the sick a complete recovery & to expiate their sins for every bit of suffering.'
b'Speak less if you can. If nothing good is going to be said, be silent. If you see something bad, advise kindly. Not in an arrogant way!'
b"Don't be a show off. Question your intention before doing a deed. Do good away from the public eye. The  rewards from Him are greater."
b'No matter how much material gains you make in this world, if your heart is not connected to the Almighty, your happiness is temporary.'
b'If you keep looking back, living a life of regret, how can you expect to move forward & embrace all that the Almighty has in store for you?'
b'Whatever you do, be gentle. People might have forgiven your harsh words but they may never forget how it stabbed their heart at that time!'
b"Your self worth doesn't depend on what others say about you. You don't have to apologise for the way you look & your belief. Be yourself."
b"Many times things happen which you don't understand. You feel discouraged by the twists & turns in life. They're all a part of His plan."
b"At times, the pain you're going through seems so unbearable & you feel you can't go on. Don't get angry with yourself. Nothing is permanent"
b"Your haters & critics don't control your life. They want to show that they have a hold on you, your emotions & reactions. Ignore them."
b"Just because the Almighty hasn't  given it to you yet, doesn't mean He won't or can't. He'll give it when you're ready. He knows best!"
b"As much as you think you know someone mainly from what they post on social media, think again. All their unshared struggles we don't know!"
b"Don't fret when you're tested. The Almighty knows what He's doing. Some of your greatest tests will turn out to be your greatest strengths."
b"If you don't like a person, stay away & don't hurt him. Don't be vulgar, abusive & disrespectful towards him. That's a sign of weak faith."
b'Almighty. On this blessed day, give us a heart that will obey You, no matter what happens, no matter what the circumstances may be. Aameen.'
b"Don't wish ill on others as much as you want to hurt those who hurt you. Wish them healing. Wish them love. Walk away. The Almighty knows."
b"Don't expect others to have the same heart as you. You'll end up disappointed if you think they'll do for you as you would do for them."
b"Do you know someone with a good heart; who accepts apologies you don't give & sees the best in you? They're a rare breed. Treat them well."
b"A quiet person is not a weak person. He's strong in fact. He has struggles like all of us but he chooses not to stress others with it."
b"When you strive in the way of the Almighty, you don't worry about being accepted or having the approval of others. You know your priority."
b"Learn to forgive & let go of those who have wronged you so you'll be free to move ahead with a light heart. Let peace & happiness prevail."
b"There's beauty in pain. We connect better with the Almighty when we're in pain than when we're content. That's how He draws us closer."
b'Fame like many things can be good if used properly. But it can also destroy you because Satan is good at messing with your egos. Be wary.'
b"At times we can't control how our heart feels. It can weigh us down like a heavy burden. Ask Him to ease the feeling. He will grant peace."
b"How strange life is. The rich aren't satisfied. The poor desire to get rich. Attach your heart to your Maker & none of this will matter."
b"It's normal to feel tired & worn out sometimes. All we need is a little bit of help to push us to higher ground. Seek Him for that strength"
b"When times are tough, the easiest thing to do is to give up. But to cling on when everyone else expects you to let go, that's real strength"
b"It's easy to lose someone by the lies you've spoken. No matter how much truth you speak after that, it may be difficult to get him back."
b"Almighty. On this blessed day, we ask you to forgive our parents & grant them the highest level of Paradise for all that they've done."
b"That moment we allow ourselves to depend on others, that's the moment we will find ourselves being disappointed. Depend on the Almighty."
b"If you ever feel tired of this world, remind yourself, it's all temporary. Nothing lasts here. Only Hereafter is forever. It awaits us."
b"Whatever happens in life, it's for the best. You may have lost your job or got a new one. Whichever it may be, show patience & gratitude."
b"Don't be intimidated by those who always pick on the faults of others. Truth be told, they're the ones with the most fault themselves!"
b"Everyone of us has the same access to the Almighty, king or commoner. As long as we seek Him, He's there for us always!"

b"For as long as we're alive, expect to be hurt, criticized & insulted. Stand firm & remain patient. Let the Almighty take care of things."
b"It's easy to impress people on social media because that is not real life. Learn to make an impact in real life, away from the glare."
b"There's nothing more dear to the Almighty than us asking Him to fulfil our needs. Don't hold back. Ask sincerely. He knows what's best!"
b"Be charitable. It doesn't just mean giving money. Smile, remove whatever's troubling someone, speak good words. Your heart will be happy!"
b"Don't attach yourself too closely to people & things. Nothing lasts. Not even our problems & worries. Think of Hereafter. You'll find peace"
b"The problems we face in life are NOT stop signs. They're the Almighty's way of making us learn. So use them as guidelines to move forward."
b"Your strength doesn't come from winning. It comes from your struggles & hardship. That's why the more He loves you, the more He tests you!"
b"Never give up on hope. One day it will all come together. You'll look back on all that you've been through & thank the Almighty for it."
b'Whatever you do today, resist the urge to gossip & speak negative words about people. Take your concerns to the Almighty & pray for them.'
b"Instead of worrying about things, pray to the Almighty. Let Him know your concerns & troubles. He'll help you overcome the odds & heal you!"
b'Almighty. On this blessed day, help us defeat our egos & not be offended by what people say. Let us let go of the need to be right always.'
b"Stop pointing fingers at other people's mistakes. We all make them. It's easy to see faults. Try to have a patient heart that listens."
b'This life is too short to live being offended, angry, bitter & full of hatred. Each new day is a gift from the Almighty. Live it well.'
b"With the social media explosion we are all facing daily, don't measure your worth by what you see. Each one is special. He made us that way"
b'Always be alert & exercise self-control. Satan wil tempt us in every possible way. Make it difficult for him to get us to do what is wrong!'
b"No matter how good a person you are, some will hate you. Don't despair. People often create their own drama out of jealousy. Ignore them!"
b"Don't live a life of worry, frustration & disappointment. It saps your energy & steals your joy. You won't be able to see His blessings."
b'The Almighty has it all planned for you. Stop worrying about how  & when things will unfold. He will see to that. Your job is to trust Him.'
b"When you see someone doing bad, don't insult him. Because he may turn over a new leaf tomorrow & be a better person than who you are today."
b"When someone criticises or disagrees with you, don't let the hatred from it stay in your heart. Get rid of the feeling. Don't let it grow."
b"People demand so much from you that even when you've given your best, it isn't good enough. As long as He knows, that's all that matters."
b"Making mistakes isn't the end of the road. There's life after that if we learn from it. Seek Him. He can change your life for the better."
b"Having a bad opinion of others is a disease of the heart. Give them the benefit of the doubt, be kind & show people that you're honourable."
b"What the world needs badly now is compassion. Try to be in someone else's shoes, someone who is facing severe hardship. Pray for them all."
b'When you feel this world is too much to bear, get away from it all; devote your time to the Almighty. Pour your heart out & feel the peace.'
b'Never fear failure. It teaches us valuable lessons. It can change our lives. It lets us taste humility; the best time to get close to Him.'
b'Almighty. Keep our loved ones safe in this dangerous world. Protect & grant them good health, peace of mind & contentment above all else!'
b"Almighty. On this blessed day, we ask You to protect our parents. May we not make them low in our priority list after all that they've done"
b"Some people just love to pick on you & your mistakes. They actually feel inferior to you. Stay calm. Know that they're the problem; not you"
b"We've reached a stage where we post our problems for the world to see, but we don't speak about it to the one we're having problems with."
b"Things won't always go the way we want them to. We may need to let things go to build up new ones. It's painful. But it's part of His plan!"
b"Don't spend your life wondering what could have been. The past is done. Don't dwell on it. We can't afford to lose what's to come. Move on."
b"Many people will cross your path in life. Don't lose track of your path because you're too busy judging others. Focus on yourself instead!"
b"Don't live your life comparing yourself to others you think are better than you. Don't try to live up to them. He made each of us unique!"
b"Be careful who you chat with on social media. Often the online personality is so different from the real personality. Don't be tricked!"
b'Never tire of doing good; no matter how small the act. Remember, at times all someone needs is a hand to hold & a heart that understands!'
b"Remember we don't deserve anything. Whatever we have is a favour of the Almighty. Don't let praises get to our head. Just praise Him."
b'We all want Paradise. Yet we complain when we are tested. Adopt a new attitude. Know that nothing good comes easy. Face trials patiently.'
b'Almighty. Protect us from the evil whispers of Satan who tries to turn us away from doing good. We seek refuge in You, the All-Knowing.'
b"When someone does or says something bad to you, don't take it personally. Don't dwell on their bad reaction. Be nice to them anyway."
b"When people react negatively to you, turn it into something positive. Don't stoop to their level. Appreciate all the goodness around you."
b"Never give up on your children. No matter how bad things are, don't say you've reached your give-up point. Keep praying. He knows & cares!"
b"We keep asking for more. Before doing that, look at what we've been blessed with. Don't ask for more than we need. Learn to be grateful!"
b"Many think silence is a weakness. It's not. It's an inner strength. It teaches us to listen & tells us that at times staying quiet is best!"
b"Never think you're a bad person. Don't let Satan plant such thoughts in your head. We make mistakes almost daily. Just try to do better."
b'How you react when tested says a lot about you. Does the pain make you angry? Do you take it out on others? Remember pain  is part of life.'
b"How mature you are has little to do with age. It's the strength of your soul. The more you've endured, the stronger & more mature you get."
b'Life will always have ups & downs, good times & bad. Learn from them all. Each new day is a new opportunity to show Him how grateful we are'
b"Each hardship you face is designed specially for you by your Creator. It's for you to get closer to Him. He knows you can handle it."
b"When you're praying for someone, do so wholeheartedly. Pray for goodness & never have bad intent. Each of us needs a prayer in our favour."
b"Don't see the worst in others & expect them to see the best in you. Dont judge others & expect them to stand by you. Life isn't like that!"
b"Don't feel like you have to explain your intentions to others. He knows what's in the heart. We're all answerable to Him not His creation!"
b"Watch our tongue & what we say about others, no matter how bad the deed. Only the Almighty can decide if they're to be forgiven or punished"
b'Almighty. No matter how busy & stressful our lives are, let us always set aside time for You, time to seek Your Mercy & Forgiveness.'
b"When life doesn't make sense, when you're facing your darkest hour, that's when your faith is being tested to see if you crumble or hold on"
b"Leave haters to their hating while you reach for the clouds & beyond. Don't let small-minded people bother you & hinder your progress."
b"If you have a good heart, you'll be hurt. That's reality. Whatever others do, they know you'll forgive. But don't keep the hurt inside you."
b"When others lie to you, be honest with them. When they betray your trust, stay truthful. When they're mean, be kind. Stay true to yourself!"

b"We're all a work in progress. We're not perfect. As long as we're trying to be better than we were yesterday, that's what matters most."

b'Have a blessed #EidulAdha. #HariRaya #HariRayaQurban #Qurbani. https://t.co/Fc9osX1KSt'
b'Have a blessed #EidulAdha. I wish you a beautiful holiday with your loved ones. May the Almighty accept our sacrifice & answer our prayers.'
b'Almighty. Make this blessed #DayofArafah a day of renewal of faith in our hearts & deeds. A day of repentance & a day to get closer to You.'
b"Make the most of today, #DayofArafah. You'll never know which deed is going to please the Almighty so much that He'll grant you Mercy."
b'Almighty. As pilgrims gather in #Arafah on this Great Day of #Hajj, we pray that You grant them ease & accept their acts of worship. Aameen.'
b'Almighty. Safeguard those who are on #Hajj, answer their prayers and bring them back to their loved ones safely. Aameen'
b"The Almighty loves those who show real patience. They don't give up. They don't feel hopeless. They struggle & strive; all for His sake."
b"Seek His forgiveness often. For past sins, for those you've forgotten or overlooked. Ask the Almighty sincerely not to punish you for it."
b"Almighty. On this blessed Friday we ask You to grant those who haven't been on the #Hajj pilgrimage, the opportunity to do so soon. Aameen."
b"Don't lust after power & worldly titles. They don't matter. You can be an iconic figure but you're just another name to the Angel of Death."
b"A mother's love & favours are priceless. The truth is whatever we do will never be equal to the sacrifice & compassion mothers have shown."
b"Constantly praise the Almighty even when you're stressed, sad, confused or broken. He will then raise you & no one can bring you down!"
b"If you want to criticize, choose your words carefully. Don't be mean. Don't make personal remarks. Use kind & gentle words. Do it privately."
b"Don't begrudge the neighbour who has more, the friend who's more beautiful. The Almighty blesses us differently so use the blessings wisely."
b"Almighty. Give me patience when things don't go my way. Help me find it in my heart to accept what You will & that You're the Best Planner."
b"Today, we've become more selfish. It's often about us. Learn to extend a helping hand, bring someone else up. Be caring. Be compassionate."
b"Don't think that suffering weakens you. It doesn't. It shows the depth of life He has created. So when pain drags you down, He's there!"
b"The best part of your life is not lived loudly on a world stage for all to see. It's the small acts of kindness which nobody knows about."
b'Beware those who are never satisfied. They allow Satan to keep reminding them of what is missing. No peace in their heart.'
b'Your heart may be broken to a million pieces by this world, but if you trust your Maker, He has a way of mending it, making it whole again!'
b"Don't complain & grumble while you wait for what you want. Have good patience. If the Almighty wants you to have it, He'll give it to you!"
b"You may be the healthiest person physically but if you have jealousy in your heart, you're sick. You're always sick till you get rid of it!"
b'As we enter the blessed ten days, make each of them count. Maximise good deeds & acts of charity. Work hard to get close to the Almighty.'
b'Stay away from those who are always bragging about their success & who they are. True success speaks for itself. No shouting is needed!'
b'Almighty. Grant ease to those in pain. Give them the highest level of patience & strength & a way out of their present situation. Aameen.'
b"At times you may feel like you're stuck & not getting anywhere.  Remember in life, you may have to move backward in order to move forward!"
b"One day you'll look back on your life & thank the Almighty for every little thing that has brought you where you've always wanted to be!"
b"We live in an era where we devote so much time to useless matters. Don't let the distractions take over your life & mess up your priorities."
b"When you're trying your best, that's what matters. It may not be good enough for some, but that's ok. The Almighty knows & will guide you."
b"The right path is not the easiest one. You'll be knocked down many times over. But it doesn't mean you crumble. Press on for Paradise!"
b"We all have negative thoughts sometimes. It shows we're human. But when your outlook is positive, you don't let such thoughts control you!"
b"Be wary of your desires. Don't let it get out of control. Remind yourself of what you want in the end. Paradise is worth all the sacrifice!"
b"Treat each day as a new lease of life. Don't waste it. Not everyone gets it. Ask Him to forgive your shortcomings & be a better person."
b"Whatever's happening now is for the best. You have to believe that. You might not understand it, but if you trust Him, you'll be rewarded."
b"Never mind if others look down on you or spread rumours about you. You can't control wagging tongues. Focus on pleasing The One who matters."
b"We expect too much from others. Don't. We'll end up disappointed. Don't depend on people. We need to learn this. Depend on the Almighty."
b"There's so much bad out there. Don't add to it. Be kind instead. It costs nothing. But it could mean everything to the ones you touched."
b"When He makes you wait, you think He doesn't love you. When He takes away what you love, you think He's punishing you. Trust His wisdom."
b"Guard your heart & don't let it get too attached to this world. We are mere travellers. Nothing lasts, including people's memory of us."
b"Don't go round putting others down. Stop that burning desire to make yourself feel superior. Strive to encourage people. We all need that!"
b"Some people thrive on arguing. They do it even over small & petty things. Refuse to be drawn into such arguments. Life's better than that!"
b'Be humble & share knowledge instead of looking down on those who seem to know less. Today, many love to show off whatever little they know.'
b"Don't feel defeated when you fail. It's easy to just give up & say you can't do it. Pick yourself up & press on. The Almighty is with you."
b"Let go of grudges & don't make enemies out of others. Try to live peacefully without hatred & envy. Life will be less stressful & happier."
b'Who knows the pain & tears a smile can hide except the Almighty. What is shown to the world is just a glimpse. Spill your sorrows to Him.'
b"You may ask Him for everything you desire in this world but never forget to ask for the best for your Hereafter. That's what we REALLY need!"
b"Whatever the dilemma, there's a cure. Whatever the difficulty, there's a solution. That's the Almighty's Promise. He never fails. Stay firm."
b"Almighty. Give me hope when I despair. Pick me up when I fall. Put my pieces back together when I'm broken. Protect me always. Aameen."
b"The reality is you'll never know which step you take will bring about what you've been looking for. Keep walking. Life has unexpected turns."
b"When someone trusts you & confides in you, honour it. Don't betray it. Once trust is broken. it'll be hard to pick up the pieces."
b'Some 70,000 thoughts fill our heads daily. Both good & bad. You need to choose. Anger, hatred, jealousy or positive & peaceful. Be careful!'
b'This video on marriage issues is finally uploaded https://t.co/uM4m2hh68C'
b"Hardship is actually a gift from the Almighty. If you endure & stay firm, no matter how difficult, He'll reward you & elevate your status."
b'How we interact with others can be among our biggest trials. Purify the heart from hypocrisy, pride & mischievous acts. May He guide us!'
b"Don't leave someone with harsh, unkind words ringing in their ears. Make peace & move on. You don't want this to haunt you on Judgement Day!"
b'Almighty. On this blessed day, help us hold on to hope when facing trials. Give us courage to go on when we feel the world closing in on us.'
b"Look for flaws & that's what you'll find. It's easy to be negative & complain about everything. Change your outlook. See positive results."
b"Honest, sincere people who don't pretend to be perfect. They won't judge or backstab. They're not so common but they exist. Real friends!"
b"When others throw stones at you, you've got something they want surely. Don't hit back. Keep going. Do your best! Inspire them with good."
b"Often we say things we don't mean & harm the ones we love unknowingly. Remember the body heals easier than the heart. Be mindful always."
b"If you want to know the strength of your soul, look at how patient you are, how readily you accept His Will. Don't break when you're bent!"
b"It's easy to let the world consume you & be unhappy with your self image. He moulded you in the best form. Don't let the world trick you."
b"Depression, self-doubt &  low self-esteem are all whisperings of Satan. Don't despair. Pull yourself out & restore your trust in Him alone."
b'Prayer is one of the best cures for diseases of the heart. Communicate with your heart & soul. Get close to Him. He will give you comfort.'
b"We know how fast time flies. There's no replay; no going back. So don't waste it with idle talk & gossip. Respect His Blessing of time!"
b'All killings, no matter where they are perpetrated are unacceptable. The latest victim, #Queens #Imam #Shooting #NYC #PrayForHumanity .'
b"For the sins we've committed in ignorance, the ones we did knowingly, we beg You to forgive us. Without Your Forgiveness, we can't carry on."
b"Pray for our children the world over. There's too much hate & hurt going around. The ones who suffer the greatest are the young ones!"
b"The Almighty may give you what you want & you may feel you have  everything in life. But without contentment, you'll never be happy!"
b"Almighty. On this blessed Friday let us not forget who's in charge of our lives. People can give advice but only You give perfect guidance."
b"Being positive doesn't mean you choose to ignore life's problems. It means you trust the Almighty will find a way out if you do your best."
b"Perhaps the best way to deal with problems is to do it quietly, patiently. No need to tell everyone. Find relief in Him. You'll stand again."
b'Beware those who embarrass or speak unkindly of family & friends behind their backs but pretend to be the nicest people in their presence!'
b"Your wealth does not make you rich but compassion, values, family, love & kindness do. Don't be deceived by what the world tells you."
b"Foolish is he who's taken in by the glamour on the outside. What lies beneath that exterior is what matters. Look deeper. Read the signs."
b"Don't treat small sins as a small matter. The danger is it becomes a habit & starts to feel normal. Recognise the signs; get back on track."
b"No matter how angry or upset you are, respect somebody else's opinion & viewpoint. You may not agree with them but they deserve to be heard."
b"Don't be worried about why you have less than others or why your worldly status seems lower. Work hard. Leave the results to the Almighty."
b"Don't beat yourself up for the mistakes you make. Learn from them. It's part of His plan for you to walk that path to learn those lessons."

b"Never stop talking to the Almighty. Tell Him what you're experiencing. After all, He created us. Only He can replace sadness with happiness."
b"Don't just sit thinking about your sins & plan to repent tomorrow. Tomorrow is never promised to anyone. Don't delay. Just do it. Sincerely."
b"Each new day's a test. Face it calmly. Know that you're not perfect but never let your anger get in the way of how you respond to problems."
b'Almighty. On this blessed Friday forgive us, have mercy on us. Shower us with blessings & guide us through hardships. Keep our hopes alive!'
b"Don't stress over the obstacles you face. The Almighty can turn them into opportunities. Carry on with life but know that He's in control."
b'Sadly too many marriages are ruined by interfering in-laws. Have boundaries to maintain a balance between spouse & family. Mutual respect!'
b"Pray for others. Don't be selfish & just pray for yourself. Want for others what you want for yourself. Feel your heart grow with love."
b"Don't be shaken by hardships. Always believe that your trial's light compared to others. What's good or not good for you is in His hands."
b"When you feel lonely, empty & frustrated, know it's all part of your trials & tribulations. Guide your heart back to the Almighty for peace."
b"We should stop looking at the faults of others. Surely we have enough of our own wrongs which we need to correct; even if it's bit by bit."

b"It's common sense not to agree with everything we watch online. Often we do it out of curiosity. Be cautious. Know the truth from the lies."
b"Work hard to rid jealousy from your heart. It's ugly. It'll have you hating on those you don't even know. You'll end up a bitter person."
b"Treat people the way you'd like to be treated. So if you want Him to forgive you, forgive others. Make that first move. Please your Creator!"
b"Don't believe the things you tell yourself when you're down. Pick yourself up. Satan loves a sad person. Don't let him mess with your mind."
